apps.name: ThisThat
apps.title: Share opinions and make instant decisions
apps.description: Share opinions and make instant decisions. Take a picture, add a question, send it to your friends and/or the public, let them vote, and see what popular opinion is.

apps.name: Swelly
apps.title: Swelly provides a platform for Gen Z and millennials to crowdsource opinions for their daily decision making.
apps.description: Swelly keeps their survey/feedback exchange as simple as possible with a standardized image based ‘this or that’ format, which is called a ‘Swell’. Both brands and users can create Swells and post them publicly, or to specific targets, in order to crowdsource opinions. With Kin, users can crowdsource quicker by featuring their Swells with a Kin reward that's given to users who engage with the Swell. User can also gift others for high quality swells and can use their Kin to purchase a 5 euro coupon for a leading retail brand.

apps.name: Tapatalk
apps.title: Tapatalk is the "mobile home" to over 200,000 online forums worldwide.
apps.description: Taptalk allows forum owners and members across the world to engage with multiple forums simultaneously through one dedicated platform. Tapatalk empower their onboarding process by using Kin as a reward for users first steps within the app - essentially guiding them towards forums and communities that they'd love.

apps.name: Kinny
apps.title: Kinny
apps.description: Send and receive Kin on social media and earn Kin in the Kinny app.

apps.name: Pop.in
apps.title: Video app that lets users compete with others on live video
apps.description: During Game Night, contestants compete in skill-based games for cash prizes.

apps.name: PeerBet
apps.title: PeerBet
apps.description: Free social betting app that lets you place bets in KIN against your friends and other players.

apps.name: Speed Genius
apps.title: Speed Genius: Speed Trivia
apps.description: Speed Trivia game where KIN incentivizes being correct quickly.

apps.name: Pause For
apps.title: Give to your favorite charities by taking a break from your phone
apps.description: Pause For is a productivity app, built to help users focus on their tasks while earning digital currency for their chosen charities. Choose your own cause and turn time spent on-task and off your phone into hot meals, planted trees, or animal vaccinations!

apps.name: MadLipz
apps.title: MadLipz is a social platform that allows users to create humorous sub and dub videos based on pop culture videos
apps.description: MadLipz is a social platform that allows users to create humorous sub and dub videos based on pop culture videos. MadLipz uses Kin to empower their onboarding process by rewarding their users for their first actions within the app. Users could also gift users for creating high quality content, and earn Kin through the Kin marketplace.

apps.name: Kinit
apps.title: Fun way to earn Kin.
apps.description: Kinit is a fun, easy way to earn Kin, a new cryptocurency made for your digital life. Earning Kin is just like playing a game, only better, because you get rewarded for completing fun daily activities like surveys, quizzes and more.
